column2: Spotify Technology SA is a digital music service offering music fans instant access to a world of music. The firm enables users to discover new releases, which includes the latest singles and albums; playlists, which includes ready-made playlists put together by music fans and experts, and over millions of songs so that users can play their favorites, discover new tracks and build a personalized collection. Users can either select Spotify Free, which includes only shuffle play or Spotify Premium, which encompasses a range of features, such as shuffle play, advertisement free, unlimited skips, listen offline, play any track and high quality audio. The firm operates through a number of subsidiaries, including Spotify LTD and is present in over 20 countries.
